Stanley Semilla

Software Engineer | Web Developer

I’m a full stack web developer who enjoys making life easier. I enjoy building applications for individuals who wants to gather, produce and share information.

Outside of the web stack, I am a Master Guardian Elite (CS:GO Rank) who plays with several tools that will help me understand and create projects for specific use. I spend my free time reading articles from Reddit or Hacker News. Oh, I also love basketball (both international and local) and I do play Counter Strike: Global Offensive. Feel free to add me up on Steam

I also worked on the Insights module of the dashboard which uses Highcharts for visualizing data sets.
